title: Tech Industry Mergers in IoT Platforms and IoT in Aviation

content.background: The tech industry has witnessed significant growth in the IoT (Internet of Things) sector, particularly in IoT platforms and IoT in aviation. IoT platforms provide comprehensive software solutions for developing, deploying, and managing IoT applications and connected devices. The global IoT platforms market is projected to rise at a strong CAGR of over 15.2% from 2023 to 2030, driven by the increasing number of IoT devices and the need for scalability. On the other hand, IoT in aviation involves the integration of IoT devices and technologies within the aviation industry to improve operational efficiency, safety, and passenger experiences. The global IoT in aviation market is expected to grow at a CAGR of over 4.3% from 2023 to 2030. These trends have led to various mergers, partnerships, and collaborations in the tech industry to gain a competitive edge.
content.summary: The tech industry is witnessing significant growth in the IoT sector, specifically in IoT platforms and IoT in aviation. The global IoT platforms market value is estimated to reach $47.5 billion by 2030, driven by the increasing number of IoT devices and the need for scalability. Additionally, the global IoT in aviation market value is projected to reach $28.7 billion by 2030, fueled by the desire for operational efficiency, cost savings, safety improvements, and enhanced passenger experiences. Various mergers, partnerships, and collaborations have been observed in the industry, as companies aim to strengthen their market share and leverage connected technologies.

title: Tech Industry Mergers: HDPE Pipes and PVC Pipes Market

content.background: The articles discuss the market trends and growth projections for the HDPE Pipes and PVC Pipes market in India. HDPE pipes are known for their durability and flexibility, while PVC pipes are versatile and resistant to corrosion. The reports provide insights into market segments, key players, and the impact of infrastructure development and government initiatives. The articles also highlight recent mergers and acquisitions in the industry.
content.summary: The Indian HDPE Pipes market is expected to grow at a CAGR of over 7.9% and reach a value of US$ 1.52 billion by 2030. The sewer & drain segment dominates the market, offering excellent chemical resistance. Key players in the market include Supreme Industries, Jain Irrigation, and Astral Pipes. In the PVC Pipes market, the value is projected to reach US$ 5.55 billion by 2030, growing at a CAGR of 7.2%. Irrigation is the largest segment, driven by the demand for cost-effective systems. Supreme Industries and Jain Irrigation are among the prominent players in this market. Recent mergers and acquisitions include Atkore Inc's acquisition of United Poly Systems and Supreme Industries' acquisition of Parvati Agro Plast, expanding their market presence.
